description:
We are looking for an experienced Principal Data Scientist – Marketing Science to join our team at CNN. In this role, you’ll be working closely with the network’s marketing organization to analyze data and uncover insights that drive marketing performance. This is an exciting opportunity to combine your data science expertise and business acumen to make a real impact on our marketing efforts.To be successful in this role, you’ll need to have a background in quantitative analysis, a passion for leveraging data to inform decisions, and experience working with marketing data sets. You should also have a strong understanding of marketing principles and the ability to communicate complex findings to stakeholders.We’re looking for someone who can think strategically and creatively, identify opportunities, and develop innovative solutions. If you’re a team player with strong problem-solving skills and a passion for data-driven marketing, we want to hear from you!

CNN is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
